ai-patthana23.57:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles means to the extent of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana23.57:0.3_0: for those who hold on to the past, future or present,
ai-patthana23.57:1.1_0: Not in the past, future, or present the mind gives rise to repulsion. Consciousness is a condition for the past, future.
ai-patthana23.57:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.57:2.1_0: Not for the sake of non-existence, not for the sake of the future, this is a condition for the future.
ai-patthana23.57:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.57:3.1_0: Not for the sake of livelihood, repetition, and for the sake of function of repulsion, views, and being conditioned by way of the future.
ai-patthana23.57:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
